name: The Fight For England
description:
In 865, A great horde of Vikings arrived on the shores of England. Since then, the kingdoms of East Anglia, Mercia and Northumbria have been conquered by the northmen. You control the last kingdom left standing - Wessex. Will you fall to the Viking horde, or will you become the new master of England?  Take land to strengthen your power - the more you have, the more men will flock to your banner.

This is a submission to the MashUpGames Jam, and the theme was "Size Matters". It was made by Henry Delap-Smith (Cyning) and Mister_Hippo (https://soundcloud.com/creative-hippo)
